# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Linux vs Windows

Відповідь: When comparing Linux and Windows, the main distinctions come down to cost, user interface, and support.

Cost: Linux is generally free, while Windows requires a fee.

User Interface: Linux offers a traditional command-line terminal, while Windows offers a graphically-based user interface.

Support: Windows offers Microsoft’s widely-used support network, while Linux relies on its open source community for support.

Ultimately, both Linux and Windows are powerful and popular operating systems that allow users to accomplish a variety of different computing tasks. The best choice is often dependent on the individual’s preferences, budget, and knowledge/expertise.
